question: Why is it important to stay up-to-date with industry developments?
options: So you can be lazy and not learn anything new
So you can change careers often
So you can stay competitive and advance in your career
So you can work from home
ans: So you can stay competitive and advance in your career

question: Why is it important to consider your values and interests when choosing a career?
options: So you can earn a lot of money
So you can work in a prestigious company
So you can be happy and fulfilled in your career
So you can travel around the world
ans: So you can be happy and fulfilled in your career

question: What is a career assessment?
options: A test that measures your intelligence
A tool that helps you identify your strengths and interests
ans: A tool that helps you identify your strengths and interests

question: Why is it important to have transferable skills?
options: So you can change careers often
So you can work in any industry
So you can be competitive in the job market
So you can earn a low salary
ans: So you can be competitive in the job market

question: The act of cutting down timber is referred to as _______?

The body of a tree that has not been cut down is called _____?
The felled timber is referred to as _____?
A tree is grown by obtaining its food in the form of ________?
